Density value utilized for mass units (Units Qmax, Units Totalizer).

The damping value is the response time of the converter value to change from 0 to 99% of a step change. The damping function is available only for the “Continuous Operating Modes” (“Standard conti.”, “Conti 1kHz”, “Conti 2kHz” or “Conti 5kHz”.
The Empty Pipe Detector is only available for Operating Mode “Standard konti.”

Output the contents of the Error Register 1 The contents of the Error Register are outputted in coded form.The individual errors are identified by the Bit: 0 Error 0 (Empty pipe), 1 Error 1 (A/D Converter saturated), 2 Error 2 (Reference voltage too small), 3 Error 3 (Flowrate > 130%), 4 Error 4 (Ext. zero return), 5 Error 5 (Data corrupted), 6 Error 6 (Totalizer defective), 7 Error 7 (Positive reference voltage too large)

Output the contents of the Error Register 2. The contents of the Error Register are outputted in coded form. The individual errors are identified by the Bit: 0 Error 8 (Negative reference voltage too large), 1 Error 9 (Line frequency), 2 -, 3 Error B (Pulse calculation incorrect), 4 Error C (Primary data incorrect), 5 Function test active, converter is not on-line, 6 Error 6 Forward (forward direction totalizer defective), 7 Error 6 Reverse (reverse direction totalizer defective)
This command is utilized to reset the Error Registers („6.30 L1 - Error Log Register 1”, and „6.31 L2 - Error Log Register 2”).
Only for Operating Mode „Batch 5kHz”.
The command changes the setting of Bit 4 in Mode Register 1 (M1 - Mode Register). 0 Forward/Reverse, 1 Forward only

The value the alarm current is set to during an error condition for the current output. This parameter is only available in converters which include a current output option (Versions 05, 07, 08, 10, 20 and 23) and whose Operating Mode is set for continuous flowrate measurements (“Standard conti.”, “Conti 1kHz”, “Conti 2kHz” oder “Conti 5kHz”).0 - 0% of the current output range setting, 1 - 130% of the current output range setting, 2 - 3.6 mA
Pulse width for the scaled pulse output

This command is only available in converters which include a current output option (Versions 05, 07, 08, 10, 20 and 23) and whose Operating Mode is set for continuous flowrate measurements (“Standard conti.”, “Conti 1kHz”, “Conti 2kHz” oder “Conti 5kHz”). 0 0 - 20 mA, 1 4 - 20 mA, 2 0 - 10 mA, 3 2 - 10 mA, 4 0 - 5 mA, 5 0 - 10 - 20 mA, 6 4 - 12 - 20 mA
Pulse factor in pulses/totalizer unit
The calibration applies to all operating modes. In the Operating Mode “Batch 5kHz”, the calibration applies exclusively to Batch 1.
Calibration 2 applies to Batch 2 for the Operating Mode “Batch 5kHz”. In the other operating modes this parameter has no effect
Calibration 3 applies to Batch 3 for the Operating Mode “Batch 5kHz”. In the other operating modes this parameter has no effect.
This command resets the totalizer and overflow counter to 0. In the Operating Mode „Batch 5kHz” the total flow totalizer Qg and the batch totalizer Q are reset.
This command resets the difference totalizer and overflow counter to 0. In the Operating Mode „Batch 5kHz” the batch totalizer Q is reset.
Only for Operating Mode „Batch 5kHz”: The total flow totalizer Qg is reset
The register can be reset using the command EM („6.17 EM - Error Log Register reset”)
The register can be reset using the command EM („6.17 EM - Error Log Register reset”)
The 2nd function character is replaced in the response by the direction arrow: > for forward, < for reverse.
Output of the instantaneous flowrate value in % of Qmax. A negative value is outputted for the reverse flow direction.
